amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a section which lists the number of underwater mortgages in 43 states and the District of Columbia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to add a section which lists the number of underwater mortgages in 43 states and the District of Columbia.

action.text: Mr. Bachus raised a point of order against the Maloney amendment (A001). Mr. Bachus stated that the amendment was not germane and violated clause 7 of Rule XVI. The Chair sustained the point of order.
